DOC.brief_summary: This study is an online (web-based) or paper-based survey for patients with transthyretin familial amyloidosis polyneuropathy (TTR-FAP) and caregivers. The results will be used to describe the emotional, physical, and financial impact of having TTR-FAP or caring for someone who has the disease.
DOC.brief_title: Burden of Disease Study In Patients With Transthyretin Familial Amyloidosis Polyneuropathy (TTR-FAP) orTransthyretin Cardiomyopathy (TTR-CM) And Caregivers
DOC.detailed_description: Convenience sample of patients and caregivers recruited through patient advocacy groups. Convenience sample.
DOC.criteria: Adults (ages 1885 years inclusive) diagnosed with TTRFAP or TTRCM and experiencing symptoms or currently providing care for a patient with TTRFAP or TTRFAP Caregivers who formally care for a TTRFAP or TTRCM patient as part of their job description and receive payment for their services.
